jobDetails.title: Python developer
jobDetails.jobDescription:
Design, develop, and deploy Python-based applications, systems, and features


Collaborate with cross-functional teams to define project requirements and specifications


Utilize AI and machine learning techniques to develop intelligent solutions and algorithms


Implement and maintain APIs and web services using Python frameworks


Write efficient, reusable, and testable code following best practices and coding standards


Troubleshoot and debug issues and provide timely resolutions


Conduct code reviews and provide constructive feedback to junior developers


Stay up-to-date with emerging technologies and industry trends related to Python, AI, and Reactjs


Collaborate with UI/UX designers to implement responsive and user-friendly interfaces using Reactjs


Optimize application performance and ensure scalability and reliability


Participate in agile development processes, including sprint planning, stand-ups, and retrospectives


Mentor junior developers and provide guidance on technical challenges


Contribute to product development by providing insights and suggestions for improvement

Requirements:

Bachelor s or master s degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or a related field


Strong proficiency in Python, with at least 3 years of hands-on experience


Solid understanding and practical experience with AI and machine learning concepts


Proficiency in developing applications using Reactjs for at least 1 year


Experience with Python frameworks such as Django or Flask


Familiarity with front-end technologies, including HTML, CSS, and JavaScript


Knowledge of software development best practices, including version control (eg, Git), testing, and code review processes


Strong problem-solving and analytical skills


Excellent communication and collaboration abilities


Experience working in an Agile/Scrum development environment is a plus


Prior experience in product development is desirable
